title: Adjective collection 2
sentences: This coffee is very good; I like it a lot.
No comas eso, parece que está
Don't eat that; it looks like it's bad.
My brother is very tall and plays basketball.
The table is a bit low for this chair.
What a beautiful landscape there is from here!
That movie seemed very ugly (bad) and boring to me.
Your cousin is very good-looking; is he a model?
I live in a very quiet neighborhood without traffic.
This restaurant is too noisy to talk.
The glass is full of orange juice.
The bottle is empty; do you want more water?
This suitcase is very heavy; I can't carry it.
I'm wearing a very light jacket because it's not cold.
The room is very dark; I don't see anything.
Me gusta la ropa de color
I like light-colored clothes in summer.
The internet is a very useful tool for studying.
This broken umbrella is useless now that it's raining.
It is a very safe place to walk at night.
It's dangerous to drive with so much snow.
My computer is very modern and fast.
We visited an ancient castle during the trip.
She is a very young girl and full of energy.
My neighbor is a very kind elderly man.
El gato de mi tía está muy
My aunt's cat is very fat because it eats a lot.
She is very thin because she exercises a lot.
The pillow is very soft and comfortable.
The bread is very hard; I can't eat it.
This street is very wide and has many trees.
El pasillo de mi casa es muy
The hallway in my house is very narrow.
Juan is a bit shy when he meets new people.
dictionary:
Bueno/a - Good
Malo/a - Bad
Alto/a - Tall / High
Bajo/a - Short / Low
Hermoso/a - Beautiful
Feo/a - Ugly
Guapo/a - Good-looking
Tranquilo/a - Quiet / Calm
Ruidoso/a - Noisy
Lleno/a - Full
Vacío/a - Empty
Pesado/a - Heavy
Ligero/a - Light (weight/color)
Oscuro/a - Dark
Claro/a - Clear / Light
Útil - Useful
Inútil - Useless
Seguro/a - Safe
Peligroso/a - Dangerous
Moderno/a - Modern
Antiguo/a - Ancient
Joven - Young
Mayor - Older / Elderly
Gordo/a - Fat
Delgado/a - Thin
Blanda/o - Soft
Duro/a - Hard
Ancho/a - Wide
Estrecho/a - Narrow
Tímido/a - Shy
